thread.title: The Credits for "American Horror Story: Hotel" Are Here and They're Terrifying
thread.title_full: The Credits for "American Horror Story: Hotel" Are Here and They're Terrifying

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: The Credits for "American Horror Story: Hotel" Are Here and They're Terrifying
text:
​Every year, Ryan Murphy and the crew at ​American Horror Story ​redo the show's credits sequence to fit the season's theme, and as you'll see below, they've really outdone themselves with ​Hotel ​. So many things are coming out of beds that are not supposed to be in beds! Small children, demon-looking people, hands — it's madness. This might be the one scenario in which bedbugs seem like a pleasant alternative. The Ten Commandments also appear onscreen in neon letters between shots of blood dripping down walls and creepy people hanging outside peepholes. To sum up: You'll never stay in a hotel again after this.
